hadiths.text: Narrated Abu Hurairah:That Sa'd b. 'Ubadah said to the Messenger of Allah (ﷺ) : What do you think if I find with my wife a man ; should I give him some time until I bring four witnesses ?" He said: "Yes

chapter.ara-name: باب فِي مَنْ وَجَدَ مَعَ أَهْلِهِ رَجُلاً أَيَقْتُلُهُ
chapter.eng-name: If A Man Finds A Man With His Wife, Should He Kill Him ?
